planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move directly to the space of the other player with the most negative reputations (minimum of 1) - if reachable by Dengar's ship speed.
c. Each other player (across all of the world) loses 1 reputation of their choice.
action: Each other player in this space suffers 2 damage on their character for each of their negative reputations. If a character is defeated this way, Dengar gains 1 fame
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
